name: Flyp Pte. Ltd.
description: Developer of a professional networking platform designed to build professional relationships. The company's platform facilitates essential professionals to build a healthy network with experts and fellow entrepreneurs by creating profiles in hospitality, retail, fitness and related industries, enabling users to connect and become productive and successful.
